item.title: Chapter2
item.description: Welcome Back !! We’ve missed you we are sorry for the skip concerning last week , let’s get right into it then … Functions Let’s finish with some functions real quick Most of the time you won’t write all the code from scratch. Nearly in any “more advanced” scripts you will need to use a library or a module , here is how you can import one :
